Class SettableSystemTime

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.transitime.utils.SettableSystemTime
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SystemTime

    public class SettableSystemTime
extends java.lang.Object
implements SystemTime
    For when need a system time that can be set to a specific value. For playback or for debugging.

    SkiBu Smith
